title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about swimming in a calm sea, according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about swimming in a calm sea: This vision is considered one of the most common visions that makes the dreamer feel a state of fear, anxiety, and uncertainty, and it has many connotations, whether good or bad. It is worth noting that seeing a calm sea symbolizes tranquility, love, and wisdom, but its interpretation is precisely due to the psychological and social state of the fortuneteller and his condition in the dream. Interpretation of a dream about swimming in a calm sea by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about swimming in a calm sea? Interpretation of a dream about swimming in a calm sea in a dream symbolizes That the dreamer reaches the highest positions and gains power and influence. And whoever sees that he is swimming on his back, this is evidence that he has committed many sins and disobedience, but he will repent for these actions and come closer to God Almighty. If he walks on the sea, this indicates his good circumstances, And his constant search for forgiveness, and his closeness to God. Swimming in stagnant sea water indicates that the dreamer will be assigned a new job and will not face any problems and things will be comfortable and simple. Whoever sees himself swimming and his enemy is with him, this indicates the dreamer’s victory over him, and if he sees sea water swallowing him and he dies, then The vision indicates the death of a martyr. The dreamer’s swimming in the winter indicates that he is suffering from some disease, and if he swims in a sea with no water in it, this indicates that he is going through a difficult and difficult phase. Interpretation of a dream about swimming in a calm sea by Ibn Sirin. The interpretation of a dream about swimming in a calm sea is considered a praiseworthy vision. Because it symbolizes excellence and success in science. This dream indicates that the dreamer is trying to learn some secret and mysterious matters, but if he learns about them, he will be in a state of sadness and distress, and if he is washed with sea water, it shows his atonement for sins and removal. Of worries. The vision indicates the dreamer’s need for peace of mind to refresh his thoughts, and if the sea water is unclean and dirty, this indicates that the person is exposed to some crises and problems in his life and the presence of garbage remains. This is a sign that the dreamer feels intense anxiety for his close friends. If one sees that he is lost in the sea, this indicates his loss and failure to achieve his goals. To interpret your dream accurately and quickly, Google the Egyptian dream interpretation website. Interpretation of dreams of swimming in the calm sea for a single woman. Interpretation of a vision of swimming in the sea A calm dream in a person’s dream is a promising vision, as it shows her psychological stability, relieves her of the stress and anxiety that accompany it, and indicates her entering into a serious emotional relationship with a young man. The man who loves her and wants to marry her. Seeing the same girl in a dream and being unable to swim means that she will face many obstacles, and if she drowns, this is a sign that she will be exposed to a major disaster and may reach the point of being separated from her life. Partner. If the sea is full of dirt and mud, this indicates that the girl is exposed to many problems and obstacles in her life, which will fail her life. If she sees herself swimming with her fiancé in a clear and calm blue sea, this indicates that her wedding date is approaching and all wedding arrangements will be completed. Interpretation A dream about swimming in a calm sea for a married woman is a bitter dream

title: Interpretation of a father hitting his son in a dream is the correct and comprehensive interpretation

preview.html: In this article, we present to you the interpretation of a father hitting his son in a dream. In detail, beating is actually a form of punishment that causes physical harm to the person who is exposed to it on the one hand and a negative psychological impact on the other hand, especially if he is dangerous and uses sharp tools, as it is among the psychological factors. Which is caused by a feeling of fear and a tendency toward violence and aggression... in social communication with others, as well as psychological disorders. On the other hand, this vision is one of the disturbing visions that indicate that something bad will happen to the dreamer based on its connotations in reality, and the dream can become frightening and frightening if it is exposed to The dreamer was beaten in a dream by his father, and it is one of the most important symbols of love and security for him. What did dream interpreters say about the symbol of this dream? We will learn this through an encyclopedia. Interpretation of a father beating his son in a dream. A position of hatred. Seeing a son beaten by his father. There is much evidence for the dreamer. An unmarried person is an indication that his wedding date is approaching, and God knows best. This vision also symbolizes benevolence and livelihood because it represents the acquisition of a lot of money that may come from inheritance, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees that his father hit him in a dream with a shoe, then this vision is one of the hateful dreams that indicate bad deeds. The dreamer and his repeated commission of forbidden acts. If the father is already dead, then seeing the dreamer beating him in a dream is only an indication that the dreamer will be blessed with money or through a property or piece of land. Seeing a dead parent beating in a dream symbolizes a message alerting the dreamer to the need To re-examine himself in the decisions he makes in reality. Seeing that the dreamer was beaten by his father in a dream in a caravan is interpreted as a sign of problems between the dreamer and his father in reality. If the beating was serious in the dream, then this vision is only a reflection Because of the state of anxiety and tension that the dreamer suffers from as a result of harm from people close to him. However, if the dreamer sees his father hitting him with a stick, this vision is hateful and indicates that the dreamer will be exposed to crises at the professional level. We provide you with the most important interpretations of a father hitting his son in a dream. At the end of this article, it should be noted that All of these interpretations presented express the jurisprudence of dream interpretation scholars, and this means that we cannot be sure that they have truly come true because only God knows the unseen, and another interpretation. Dream You can download the direct application for dream interpretation from the encyclopedia. Bibliographic references1

title: Interpretation of seeing vegetables in a dream for unmarried women

preview.html: In the following article, we present to you, dear reader, the interpretation of seeing vegetables in a dream for both single and married women, especially leafy ones, where the sleeper sees that he is eating or buying vegetables and can see that as well. Wounds with a knife, then he wants to know the meaning of his vision, which we will explain in the following lines through the encyclopedia. Vegetables are among the beneficial foods, and they are the best things a person can eat, as they provide him with strength, energy, and important nutrients, and represent goodness and blessings for a person’s life. Interpretation of seeing vegetables in a dream. Below we provide an interpretation Seeing vegetables in a dream, according to the scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin: Seeing fresh, ripe vegetables in a dream indicates kindness, blessings, and permissible benevolence for the pioneer. While rotten, damaged vegetables symbolize the hardships that the dreamer is going through and the pain and distress that he is suffering from. Eating vegetables in a dream indicates what The dreamer will experience a wide diet and his success in the coming period of his life, which may concern his work or his marriage and may concern both. Vegetables with a sweet taste indicate contentment, happiness, and the fulfillment of desires by God’s will. However, if the taste of vegetables is bitter in the dream, it is a bad omen for an unfortunate influence that does not God's destiny. Contrary to the common belief that selling vegetables in a dream is a good thing, Ibn Sirin sees selling them as an unpleasant vision that foretells loss, and the greater the amount of vegetables, the more difficult it is. While in the event that the fortuneteller becomes ill and dreams of selling vegetables, it is good news that there will be almost recovery. By order of God. Interpretation of seeing vegetables in a dream for a single woman. In the following points, we present the interpretation of seeing vegetables in a dream for a single woman: The abundance of fresh vegetables in one dream symbolizes the progress of a man of good character, and God will complete His blessing upon her, and she will marry him to find happiness with him and give birth to good offspring. Eating fresh vegetables in her dream, and their taste is sweet, indicates a change in her state from distress to relief, and the death of distress and anxiety. Selling vegetables to single people indicates that they will be exposed to some problems related to their studies or work, but buying fresh vegetables is good news for getting rid of worries and problems and that God Almighty May God Almighty guide them on the right path. Interpretation of a dream about vegetables in a dream: A married woman can see vegetables in a dream in different situations, some of which indicate goodness and others do not, which we will explain in detail below: Buying fresh vegetables in a dream symbolizes the goodness and grace that she enjoys with her. Her family and her constant desire to manage her home according to the teachings of God Almighty. A married woman feeding vegetables to her husband symbolizes how much she loves him, and her feeding vegetables to herself symbolizes the strength of the bond between them and heralds an imminent pregnancy. Seeing eggplant indicates stress and anxiety, while onions indicate strife Marital, just like rotten vegetables, while fresh vegetables are interpreted as a praiseworthy announcement of abundant money that God has blessed. Seeing leafy vegetables in a dreamThen we mention the interpretation of seeing vegetables in a dream, the leafy type: vegetables

title: Interpretation of a white book in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: The interpretation of a white book in a dream for a single woman has many different interpretations and interpretations, sometimes it shows kindness and abundant food, sometimes it shows knowledge, and sometimes ignorance. From one person to another, the interpretation cannot be generalized to all people, and in the following article through the encyclopedia we will clarify some evidence that we saw the white paper in a dream. Interpretation of the white book in a dream for a single woman: Seeing a girl in a dream with a white paper indicates many things. Sheikh Ibn Shirin interpreted the vision of a single man on white paper in a dream as follows: If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is receiving a white paper from someone, this indicates that she will receive money from one of the people close to her. If she dreams that she is holding papers, This means that she is diligent in her studies and work and that she will reach a higher position and get a promotion. If he sees in a dream that he sees white papers and the girl is uneducated, then this is a sign of ignorance. If a girl dreams that she sees papers written on them, then the dream indicates that she will soon have On the things she wants, but these things may be a little far from her. If she sees white paper in a dream and the girl is educated, this means that she will be saved from the evil that will befall her, and seeing yellow paper is evidence of some difficulties and problems in the girl’s life. If the girl sees it in a dream If a married woman sees in her dream that she is cutting yellow paper, then this dream is an indication that she will get rid of problems, and that she will pay off the money. Some debts, or that she will be cured of diseases. A married woman who sees a lot of cards in a dream is evidence that she will earn a lot of money and she and her family will obtain a lot of good. Also, a married woman dreaming of cards in a dream means that she will reach a high position at work. If the woman is knowledgeable. If the woman is ignorant and sees the white paper in a dream, this is a sign of her ignorance. Seeing a married woman in a dream writing on a white paper is a sign of kindness and that she will get the things she wants and will be happy soon. Seeing a woman in a dream That she is eating a leaf from the book indicates her strong connection to knowledge and understanding. If she dreams that she is eating a paper Qur’an, this indicates her closeness to God and her attachment to religion. Interpretation of a white piece of paper in a dream for a pregnant woman: A pregnant woman who sees some leaves written on it in a dream is evidence that she and her child will enjoy goodness. It indicates Seeing white paper in a dream also indicates that God will protect her and her child from harm. Seeing her eating from the paper of the Qur’an is evidence of her strong connection to religion and her understanding. Seeing that she has blank papers in a dream is evidence that she and her child will have a lot of money. Seeing that she does not cut the paper Yellow is evidence of getting rid of problems and difficulties

title: Interpretation of the dream of the Hour of Resurrection by Ibn Sirin, interpretation of the dream of the Hour, and pronunciation of the Shahada.

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about Hora is one of the very important topics that everyone who meets and sees this dream in a dream searches for, and today in our topic we have everything that dream interpretation scholars have provided about the interpretation of this dream, whether in a dream of a married woman, a single woman, or a pregnant woman, as interpretations vary according to the details of the dream and the social situation. The interpretation of a dream about Hurama is the interpretation of a dream about Hurama? The Day of Resurrection is the promised day that every person knows is coming inevitably, and seeing it in a dream carries many connotations and indications that can be summarized by what scholars specializing in the interpretation of dreams have said as follows: If the dreamer is certain that what What he saw in his dream is indeed the Day of Resurrection, then this is a sign of the disappearance of injustice from everywhere, the spread of justice, the victory of the oppressed, and the annihilation of the oppressor. If he sees one of its main signs and does not feel fear or anxiety, then he is a person distinguished by righteousness and guidance and who performs many good deeds that make his heart happy. reassured and ready to meet his Lord. Some commentators said that if he had been wronged before, then God (Glory be to Him) would soon take revenge on him from the oppressor who was subjected to this injustice. It was also said that it was a sign of victory over his enemies and that he was following the right path regardless of the attempts of others to make him think. In another way, out of hatred and envy towards him. If the dreamer does not move from his place or leave when he sees the sky torn apart or other signs indicating the Day of Resurrection and the Hour of Resurrection in the dream, then he lives with a clear conscience and did not do so. He. She. What makes him feel anxious about being exposed to danger, and he does not have enmity with anyone, whether in his field of work or in the context of his personal life. As for his intense fear, it is evidence that he has sinned greatly against some weak people, especially if they have power and influence, and he must quickly repent and return. About these works before the time comes. To get the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search on Google on the Egyptian Dream Interpretation website, which includes thousands of interpretations by leading interpretation scholars. And on the Day of Resurrection, when he said: If the dreamer had a good reputation and good morals, then his vision indicates his end. Injustice was imminent, especially if he lived in an occupied country or wasted the rights of his children due to the greed of its rulers, and the sun of justice will rise very soon. But if a person does not preserve the sanctities of God, and does not perform the acts of obedience and worship that He commanded him to do, and follows Satan as he commanded him, then the dream is a sign and warning. Strong as it may be. He will be arrested for the sin he committed, and the time of his reckoning will come, and he has not yet repented, so he must hasten to repent, stay away from sins and transgressions, and replace them with good words and deeds. When opinions differ about seeing the sea in a dream for a single girl, we have come up with the most reliable interpretations. What if an unmarried girl sees the sea raging and expresses her fear in her dream. The vision indicates that there are a lot of overflowing feelings that seek To her towards a specific person. But if he saw that he was swimming in the sea and almost drowned in the dream, then I have the only girl. The vision showed that there is a small obstacle in her life, but she will soon get rid of it, thanks to God Almighty. As for seeing the calm sea in a dream of a single girl. It has meanings of goodness and happiness. Which you will feel with a strong vision, God willing. If an unmarried girl sees that she is drowning in sea water, and someone comes to save her in the dream. It could mean that she has a lot of problems and that someone is helping her and cooperating with her in her affairs and in all her problems. While she saw herself She swims brilliantly in the raging sea in the dream of an unmarried girl. It is an indication of the strength and solidity of the character that can face many of the problems present in the life of the dreamer. See also: Rising sea level in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the sea in a dream for a married woman. When a married woman sees that she is looking To the sea and she was sad in the dream. The vision indicated her fear of the future or her fear of what seemed unknown to her, and God Almighty knows best. While in a dream she saw a married woman swimming in the sea without fear or hesitation. The vision showed the strength of her personality in challenging obstacles and facing problems, especially if The sea was rough. As for seeing her drowning in the sea and trying to save her situation in a married woman’s dream. If a married woman saw that she was swimming in the sea, then a violent storm came to the sea and she almost drowned in the dream. The vision may indicate that she will face some difficulties related to her life’s path. But we will get rid of it. From them quickly, by the command of God Almighty. Seeing swimming in a calm sea in a married woman’s dream. This means that she feels sincere feelings towards her husband in some of their affairs. It is said about seeing a raging sea and crashing waves in a married woman’s dream. This is evidence of the presence of some marriage problems that the owner is going through. The vision in this period, and God Almighty knows best. Interpretation of seeing the sea in a dream for a man and its meaning. While when a married man sees the sea, there may be many differences from it, and from any other situation. Seeing a raging sea with crashing waves in a married man’s dream. This means that he is exposed to some problems. Or crises in his private life, and God Almighty knows best. While he sees the calm sea that a married man is looking at in a dream. Elements of stability in this person’s life, from private matters and the like. A case if a married man dreams that he is swimming skillfully in a raging sea. The vision showed firmness and strength. The personality possessed by the dreamer. Seeing yourself swimming with many people in a married man’s dream can be interpreted as satisfaction

title: Interpretation of giving a dead person’s gift in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of the gift of a dead person in a dream through this article. God Almighty said: “O leaders, advise me regarding my dreams if you are a vision passing by (43),” so the vision of a dead person comes from someone. He misses you so much, Beit al-Haqq, and only God knows the unseen. Today in an encyclopedia we present different interpretations of a dream about the gifts of the dead to the living. Follow us.Interpretation of a dead man’s gift in a dreamInterpretation of a dead man’s gift in a dream by Ibn SirinIf someone sees the presence of a dead person in a dream, he is gifted with a large Qur’an. The vision indicates the dreamer's return to God's path. Seeing the dead gives the fortuneteller new, clean clothes. It is an indication of the wealth and luxury that God Almighty gives to this dreamer, especially if these clothes are decorated with gold and silver. And in the case of the clothes being presented by heirs. intersect; It symbolizes poverty and lack of livelihood in the dreamer’s life. If someone sees in a dream that the deceased is given a good fresh apple. The vision indicates that a lot of good will come to the dreamer. If it is not edible; It indicates the great loss that the dreamer suffers in his life and ends with great sadness. If one sees in a dream that the deceased gave him a child. The vision indicates the approach of happiness and its satisfaction.Interpretation of giving money to a living person in a dreamIf one sees in a dream that he is taking banknotes from a dead person, the vision symbolizes positive changes that will soon occur in the dreamer’s life.In the event that the fortuneteller refuses to take money from the dead person. The vision expresses the dreamer’s rejection of any positive changes in his life. As for seeing a dead person asking for money in a dream. The vision symbolizes the charity that the deceased needs and the dreamer wants to take away from him. If a person in a dream takes coins from the deceased. The vision indicates a major problem in which the dreamer falls into. Another interpretation of the vision of receiving coins from the dead is that it expresses the challenges that exist in the dreamer’s path, with his inability to overcome them. Interpretation of a dead man’s gift in a dream for a single girlIf an unmarried girl sees in her dream the presence of a dead person He gives her money. The vision shows that this girl will get married soon, or it shows that she will get something expensive and valuable. If the girl sees the dead person, give her coins. This vision expresses the crises and problems that this girl will face in her life, and the amount of these crises is related to the amount of money. In the event that the girl obtains money in her dream. This vision indicates that the girl has high ambitions and aims for prestige. But if an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is receiving money from a dead stranger. The vision symbolizes the job opportunity that you will obtain and that this opportunity will bring you a lot of money. Interpretation of saving dead gold in a dream If one sees in a dream that he is taking a piece of gold from the dead in a dream, then this vision indicates that the dreamer will reach a great leadership position in the future. Like a piece of gold. Among Ibn Sirin’s interpretations is that seeing someone taking a lot of gold jewelry from death in a dream is a praiseworthy vision that symbolizes abundant profit.

title: Interpretation of a dream about exams by Ibn Sirin and senior scholars

preview.html: What is the interpretation of dream examination by Ibn Sirin? Interpretation of a dream about an examination in a dream includes dozens of interpretations that could be promising if the examination was easy and the dreamer could pass it. However, if the examination was difficult in the dream and the dreamer failed in it, then the dream will be dirty and full of warning meanings, and in the following article it will be found The dreamer has the appropriate meaning of his dream. You have a dream that confuses you. You are waiting for it.. Google is an Egyptian site for interpreting dreams. Interpretation of the dream of exam. If we talk about the interpretation of the dream of exam, we will start with its general meaning, which is fear and a feeling of threat. The jurists said that the dreamer feels tension and discomfort in the following aspects of life: Or not: If the dreamer He is doing work in reality, and he is afraid of it. He dreams of exams, and he often finds it difficult and does not know the correct answers to his questions. Second: The dreamer who fears engagement and marriage will see that he is in a state of testing in a dream and the vision is repeated for him, but in different forms. He can see The test is difficult or the time allotted for it has expired. He answers all the questions and the like, and in the end the dream in this case is interpreted with one meaning, which is the dreamer’s fear that he will fail in love and suffer from the pain of separation. Third: A dreamer who is thinking about creating his work while awake may dream of the result of this work and hesitates to implement it on the ground. In reality, taking exams over and over again. Fourth: The student may dream of exams as the exam season approaches, and in this case the dream expresses his intense fear of failure or failure in the academic year. Fifth: The fortuneteller who lives in unsatisfactory conditions and struggles in his life to achieve his goals will dream of exams, But if he sees the exam as easy, this is good news that he will avoid troubles in his life and achieve the desired ambitions. Interpretation of a dream about an exam by Ibn Sirin. The tests or examinations that we undergo today are a modern topic and were not known in ancient times to whoever Ibn Sirin and other senior jurists were. With papers and pens and their colors. Was the dreamer able to write in the dream or was it difficult to write? Based on what was mentioned in the previous lines, examination in the dream indicates bad situations that the dreamer will face soon, and this will result in a feeling of sadness and difficulty, especially if he sees that the paper he is writing on is black and has A strange shape. If the dreamer dreams that he is using a blue or dry pen to answer exam questions, then he is living in progress and prosperity, and the easier it is to use the pen, the more positive the vision is and heralds success at work. It is not preferable for the fortuneteller to use the red pen while answering exam questions. Because it indicates many psychological and material pressures. If the dreamer sees that he cannot write, as if his hand is paralyzed, then the dream indicates bad luck and the many obstacles that he will suffer soon. Ibn Sirin said that if the fortuneteller can write in a dream in a good way, then the meaning of the scene means Increasing his knowledge levels, he can succeed in advanced stages of science and knowledge. All you are looking for is to learn yourself

title: Praying with the dead in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing praying with a dead person in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried girl dreams that she is praying with a dead person and that this girl loves him very much. This dream shows that this girl is virtuous, performs prayers on time and provides assistance to those in need. When an unmarried girl dreams that she is praying with a dead person, And that the dead person feels sad while he is praying with her. This dream indicates that this girl is doing unpleasant things, and this is a signal for her to change herself and improve her situation. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that the dead person is praying but she stopped praying with him. This dream indicates that this girl will She hears bad news in her life and she will suffer for a long time from this news. When an unmarried girl sees in her dream that the dead person is praying without ablution. This vision indicates that the dead person wants someone to give charity to his soul and not rest in his grave. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is praying with... The dead, but that girl was unhappy in her life. This dream shows that this girl was troubled and miserable in her life and could not change her life. When an unmarried girl saw in her dream that she was praying with the dead, this girl was happy. This dream indicates that this girl will propose Soon someone will find someone who will make her happy. And she will live a happy, beautiful, and stable life with her. See also: Interpretation of seeing prayer in a dream and its importance according to Nablus. Interpretation of attending the dead person’s prayer in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is praying with the dead person. This dream indicates that this woman is obedient to her husband. And her servant, and she loves her husband and wife, and she loves people. When a married woman sees in her dream that she is praying with the dead person, and that the dead person was unhappy. This dream indicates that this woman is inappropriate and immoral, and does not care about her home and her husband, and does not like to feed others. If she sees A married woman sees a dead person praying in her dream, then she does not pray with him. This vision indicates that this woman will hear happy news about her pregnancy in the coming period. But if a married woman sees in her dream that a dead person is praying and she does not look at her and does not want to pray with her. This dream indicates However, this woman does not perform her duties and does things that do not please God, and she will change herself. When a married woman sees in her dream that she is praying with the dead person, but this woman was familiar to him. This dream indicates that this dead man wants this woman to return to the path of God. She reads the Qur’an and stays away from evil people in her life. Interpretation of seeing praying with a dead person in a dream for a man and its meaning. If a person sees in his dream that he is praying with the dead, then this dead person is also in peace. This dream indicates that this person is comfortable in his life and stable, and he will be blessed with kindness and provision. Soon. When a man sees in his dream that he is praying with a dead person, he has also met him. This dream shows that this person is just, good, and loves life. And that this man loves helping others and pleasing parents. If a man sees in his dream that he is praying with a dead person, then the dead person will be sad. Also, this dream indicates that this person is sad in his life. He is facing problems and problems
